name: The Path of Desire
description:
The Path of Desire was developed by Kalea Kawaii (KawaiiCreates) and Mars Morris (funderstaffed) for the course ARTG 139 Queer and Trans Art and Games. 

In this game, desire paths represent the queer experience of choosing your own path and finding your own way. This game explores concepts of chosen family and queer community, the idea being that straying from the marked path can actually be incredibly rewarding.
